title: Tools Introduction  | UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: Tools required for assembling a UV Pro Plus are explained in this video. All the tools will be locally available and the choice of tools has been such that the assembly will be easy.

title: BOX ANATOMY | UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: The Anatomy of a box which can be made in to a UVC Chamber. The Important aspect of the anatomy is the inner structure and the Grill placement. We are making UVDOSTH Pro Plus here.

title: LAMP POSITIONING | UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: The positioning of the lamps inside the chamber which will give a 360 degree throw of the light elements is described in this video. The lamps should be positioned in the top, left side and right side of the walls of the chamber for better throw. The inside of the chamber is white in color and thus the reflection of the light will be better.
buy: To buy your UV DOSTH or to order the components to build one please visit our website.

title: INTERIOR CIRCUITRY  | UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: All the electrical equipment are connected in parallel and there are two switch connections to be made to the bulb. The push to on switch and also the timer switch. The connections are made in parallel for easy troubleshooting and maintenance.
buy: To buy your UV DOSTH or to order the components to build one please visit our website.

title: WIRE POSITIONING | UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: Running through the wires in the UV Chamber is done with parallel connection of the bulbs with the Push-to-on switch.Pro Tip: Use a 2 core wire with white sleeve and bring all the wires to the bottom of the chamber for the final connection.
buy: To buy your UV DOSTH or to order the components to build one please visit our website.

title: WIRE CONCEALING | UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: Any wire which is not concealed within the chamber will not give a good look within. To conceal the wiring, use a WHITE colored insulation tape. which is 2' thick. 1) Hold the wire in place with smaller piece of tape. 2) Run the tape along the complete length to conceal the wire.
buy: To buy your UV DOSTH or to order the components to build one please visit our website.

title: TIMER BOX ASSEMBLY  | UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: The timer switch box assembly is explained in this video. The box is the common PVC box and where the timer switch is fixed.The final assembly is fixed to the chamber in the top portion before the final circuit connection.

title: FINAL CONNECTION   |   UVDOSTH Pro Plus
desc: The final connection which involves the mains chord, switch and the lamp are explained here. The lamps are connected in parallel. The timer switch and the push to on switch are connected in serial. The final connection with the connector is shown here.
